description: This file implements a React component for displaying a restaurant's page, including restaurant info, menu, shopping cart, and order placement functionality.

methods.name: RestaurantPage
methods.description: Main React functional component for the restaurant page, managing state, fetching data, displaying menu, cart, and handling order submission.

methods.name: addToCart
methods.description: Handles adding a menu item to the cart, increasing quantity if already present.

methods.name: placeOrder
methods.description: Creates an order with the current cart items and navigates to the order confirmation page or displays an error.
